caption.p:
Four examples showing intratidal variations in the water depth, near-bed velocity and combined current-wave shear stress ( τ
cw ) compared to the critical bed shear stress ( τ
cr ) at the observation stations. A complete exhibition of all the observations was in the attached Supplementary Fig. S1. The figures were created using ArcGIS 10.1 ( www.esri.com/software/arcgis) and CorelDRAW Graphics Suite X6 ( http://www.coreldraw.com/en/product/graphic-design-software).
